author: NewsBreak Original
title: Arrests and Incidents reported March 14, 2024
text:
By Gauge Day ,
1 hour ago CULLMAN, Ala. – Below are the arrests and incidents reported March 14, 2024. All persons are innocent until proven guilty.
GJ = grand jury; FTA = failure to appear
